QuestData.Title: Fighting Tooth and Claw
QuestData.Description: It appears that Lord Walden has finally taken notice to our presence and has heightened his defenses. It's worthless really... nothing will deter our pack.$B$BThe path ahead to him is rife with powerful Scourge minions, but I trust that you will be able to clear the path for the rest of us to follow in. Once we kill Walden, it should be a straight shot to his cowardly leader.
QuestData.RewardText: <Packleader Ivar Bloodfang grins, revealing his razor-sharp teeth.>$B$BIt won't be long now before the entire keep is ours, thanks to your valiant efforts.
